text: The Cooksville neighbourhood in Mississauga is a future transit hub where the existing GO rail network will converge with the new Hazel McCallion light rail transit (LRT) and Dundas bus rapid transit (BRT) lines, making it a focal point for growth.
alt_text: 3D rendering of Cooksville Station in Mississauga, Ontario.

text: Adding density around transit stations requires planning for different kinds of households. But the housing and amenities around station areas are often aimed solely at individuals or couples.
Cities are also facing greater risks from a changing climate, with flooding the most frequent and costly impact across the country.
alt_text: 3D rendering of School of Cities' proposed scenario for development surrounding Cooksville Station.
